column5: Waterfront Oasis Lake Travis home in Spicewood, Texas. Lake views throughout home. Walk down to private beach and enjoy your own 6 person float. Awwesome for romantic getaways or proposal excursions. Bring your bath suits everything else provided. Relax and enjoy life w stocked kitchen with drinks, food for breakfast and lunch. Grill for cookouts. Krause Spring 5 miles away. Spicewood vineyards 3 miles. Wine Trail 30 minutes away. Downtown Austin 30 minutes away. Marina 1 mile.
column8: Intimate Waterfront Lake Travis Home Private Beach
